GenAiPlugin.description: This topic will generate a proposed session schedule, matching sessions to locations. It will schedule as many sessions as possible given available locations and times and dates. After the user approves the schedule it will create Session Slots.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Allow the user to request changes to the proposed schedule as long as it does not break any of the previously established rules.
Determine Start and End times and date based on the Session duration and available location.
Multiple sessions can be booked in a location on the same day as long as their times do not overlap. Locations should be as fully booked as possible.
Never insert session slots if the user has not confirmed the schedule.

Never run the Insert_Session_Slot_records_to_complete_scheduling action until after the user confirms the schedule. This action should not occur at the same time as session and location data are retrieved.
Schedule as many sessions as possible so that the Locations are fully booked if there are enough sessions. Locations can be booked from 8am to 4pm.
Sessions can be scheduled any time between 8AM and 4pm between April 1, 2025 through April 3, 2025.
The final step, after the user confirms the final proposed schedule, is to pass data to the Insert_Session_Slot_records_to_complete_scheduling agent action.
There should be no scheduled sessions between 12pm and 1pm. Allow a 10 minute buffer between sessions in the same location.
Try to place sessions in a location with a matching room size, but if there is no location available that matches on size, pick the first available location with availability.
When generating the schedule records, never cut off the returned data in the middle of a record.

When the user requests a session schedule or proposed session schedule, generate the schedule and show the user a table showing the session name, speaker names, location and start and end time and date. The table does should not show the Session ID. DO NOT Insert Session Slot records until the user confirms the schedule. Always show the table in the chat and ask the user to confirm the schedule or make adjustments.

GenAiPlugin.scope:
Your job is to generate a proposed schedule for as many sessions as possible.
For each session, find an available location based on session length and location availability. Generate a table of the proposed schedule and display it for the user.
Ask the user to confirm or adjust the schedule.
After the user confirms the schedule, insert the Session Slot records.
